description: For sale: $899,000. Updated single story home. 3 bedrooms, 2 baths set on a almost 7,000 sq ft corner lot. House has been updated throughout. Gleaming hardwood floors, crown molding, ceiling fans, recessed lighting. Kitchen has granite counter tops, cherry cabinetry and Kitchen Aid stainless steel appliances. Baths have been updated with high end tile and fixtures. Copper plumbing and newer roof. Family room permits are unknown. 2 car attached garage.

facts.construction quality: 6.0 provided by the county assessor, this grade is based on a scale that varies by market. for more information, or to update the grade, contact the county assessor's office.

title: Santa Clara Home For Sale
